entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [DAC][DBI] ICorDebugModule::GetMetaDataInterface fails in net6.0 for "Anonymously Hosted DynamicMethods Assembly" in unit test project. #62977
  • Performance optimization suggestion for Enum.Value.ToString() #62976
  • Creating symbolic links without developer mode or elevation fails silently #62975
    7.0.0
  • Debugging a self-contained app locks its mscordbi.dll #62974
  • Should there be more volatile in ConcurrentDictionary? #62972
  • Consider augmenting regex tests with "polyglot regex corpus" #62971
  • .NET 6 Managed `ThreadPool` / `Thread` performance and reliability degradations #62967
    6.0.x
  • [wasm][NodeJs] System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 test failed #62965
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] debuger test failures on CI #62964
    7.0.0
  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.21.56803 is missing from symbol servers. #62962
  • Fix incorrect assert for cgroup file system type #62960
  • JsonIgnore in record declaration #62961
  • LoggerMessage not serializing type #62957
  • Support equivalent of AssemblyBuilder.Save to save in-memory IL to an assembly #62956
    7.0.0
  • Runtime libraries: debug symbols missing for latest patches (5.0.13, 6.0.1) #62955
  • [question] bcl between different instruction package like Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x64 and Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.win-x86 #62953
  • The response ended prematurely #62963
  • [API Proposal]: Make `Lookup<TKey,TElement>` publicly constructable #62949
  • [Uri] LocalPath shouldn't encode unicode chars #62946
  • RuntimeHandles should implement IEquatable #62944
  • Support file named 'NUL' #62943
  • The mscordbi.dll .NET 5.0.13 is missing from symbol servers. #62939
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937

Closed

  • Style: should be System.Random(Int32 seed) rather than System.Random(Int32 Seed) #62969
  • JIT does not recognize Vector<T>.Count and Vector{128|256}.Count is unsigned in div / mod #62326
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'child->isContained()' #60330
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4\\Vector2_3_4.cmd #61579
    7.0.0
  • Error unzipping file with GZipStream #62954
  • NativeAOT smoke tests failed #62950
  • typo in autogenerated cs file #62909
  • How to identify ICU is used in .net 6 and later... #62930
    Future
  • NativeAOT missing src/tests/issues.targets changes. #62907
  • Spurious Newlines Added to Log Output #61763
  • .Net 6 `System.Random` returns only 0 after a while when initialised with a seed #61789

PullRequests

Created

  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62973
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [tests] Cleanup copy/pasted assembly update test projects #62970
    area-Infrastructure
  • Suppress OSR for crossgen2 execution #62968
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle RunClassConstructor with nonreflectable cctor #62947
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow building libs against NativeAOT CoreLib #62945
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-vs4mac] Set stabilize package version to false #62941
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add RID for Alpine 3.15 #62938
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update shared trimming attributes with recently added/used types #62911
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework
  • Unify implementation of string constructors accross runtimes #62936
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage tests #62867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove forward-sub for hw intrinsics during inlining #62883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #62790
  • RPM package needs to create host symlink #62925
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 6.0.x
  • OSR support for Arm64 #62831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • setInternalRegsDelayFree only for candidate lclVars #62884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    area-System.Security
  • Remove an unused .editorconfig entry. #62905
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • corerun: silently ignore directories when building TPA #62932
    area-Host
  • Handle zero-sized unwind fragment candidates #62931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Corrected the typo in autogenerated cs file. #62934
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Increase iteration count in the FinalizeTest #62924
    area-System.Threading
  • Add Pri-0 test suppressions for NativeAOT #62926
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x

Updated

  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Move coreclr specific ComponentActivator hosting dependency to coreclr #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono
  • Implement the "moffset" encoding size optimization in `emitOutputAM` #62896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1519084 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal and libunwind directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Upload checked JITs for Release branches and introduce jitmap.txt #61597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues in PAL #62625
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Have NativeAOT test execution project include SDK #62927
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
